articles.title: Pregnant Ascension nurse passes with unborn child due to COVID-19 - WEAR
articles.description: PENSACOLA, Fla. -- A pregnant nurse at Ascension Sacred Heart, along with her unborn child, passed away due to COVID-19. 32-year-old Hayley Richardson died within three weeks of catching the virus. Caption: WEAR. Richardson's family and friends, as well as he…
